subject: National Invitation Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Angel Robinson had 16 points and 8 rebounds to help Marquette win the Women’s National Invitation Tournament title with an 81-66 victory against Michigan State in East Lansing, Mich. Krystal Ellis had 15 points and led a 23-2 run in the opening minutes for the Golden Eagles (21-14).
